Hi, Frederik here 👋

I am a fullstack web developer.

My Story

After working as a management consultant for almost 4 years, I decided it was time for a change: I had a strong desire to move from defining strategies to building products.

While I was working full-time I had already started doing a computer science course. I really enjoyed the problem solving aspects of it and the opportunity to build real-world applications.

When the time came to decide on my next career move, it was easy to connect the dots. I wanted to transition into software development.

Since then, I mainly focused on building web apps using Javascript and React.

Scroll down to view my projects 👇
